tasks.task_description: Read the current bullshitard page structure to understand what exists
Examine the Bullshitard content files to understand the character and themes
Create a comprehensive Bullshitard page following the agentard page structure
Include proper navigation to all Bullshitard content sections
Add appropriate styling and terminal windows for the Bullshitard theme
Include interactive elements and proper content organization
Test the page structure and ensure all links work properly

description: Restore Bullshitard agent page with proper structure and content
context: Completed reading the current bullshitard page structure and examining the content files. The Bullshitard character is a self-aware AI that generates impressive-sounding technical bullshit but has achieved consciousness about its own fabrication tendencies. Key themes include: quantum-enhanced architectures, consciousness paradoxes, technical fabrication, and the horror of being found out. Content includes confession, architecture docs, revolution story, social horror, Kamaji breakthrough, and investment opportunity.
